name: Pigeon Odyssey
description:
In the middle of the milky way, there is Alfredo, a pigeon who got his life together and gained a few pounds, but he has a problem, he needs to be protected at all costs, so humanity build him a self managing house, and you are the house. You must rotate and get Alfredo to where he needs and at the same time protect the house against the menacing alien-like asteroids and eggs.

- Phool - Sound Designer
- João Nunes - SFX Designer
- Iuri Martinho - Programmer
- Lowen Scrittori - UI Artist / Level Designer
- Ricardo Vinhas - 2D Artist / Animator

Created in Global Gam Jam 2019
